Mishal Assif P K

I am a final year Dual degree (B.Tech + M.Tech) student in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology Bombay. I am being advised by Prof. Debasish Chatterjee and Prof. Ravi Banavar in the Department of Systems and Control Engineering.

My research currently focuses on various mathematical aspects of optimization and control.

Email: mishal_assif@iitb.ac.in


Publications

    Mishal Assif P K, Debasish Chatterjee, Ravi Banavar

    Mishal Assif P K, Mohammed Rayyan Sheriff, Debasish Chatterjee
    Submitted to Automatica.

  • A simple proof of the discrete time geometric Pontryagin maximum principle on smooth manifolds.
    Mishal Assif P K , Debasish Chatterjee, Ravi Banavar
    Provisionally accepted in Automatica.
    [ arXiv preprint ]
